attributes.action: More help with those affected with mental health and self isolation
attributes.additional_details:
How many suicides are going to happen before you remember about those millions of people you have forgotten about, everyone affected with mental health.

More can be done to help those struggling with self isolation. 

How? I’m no expert but if something doesn’t change more people will die. 

Suicide was already up by 17% last year without this these restrictions
attributes.background:
Boris, you have told the UK only essential workers are allowed to be out and everyone else once a day for exercise.
Have you not thought about those with mental health problems who rely on going out every day to help manage their illness who are classed as high risk

Their is no help or guidance!

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced a lifting of some lockdown restrictions.

You might like to sign and share this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300585
